item.title: Optimising Interest Earned on Savings for Tertiary Students
item.author: pravinmanoj44@gmail.com (Pravin Modotholi)
item.description: Being a Tertiary student in New Zealand can happen to be more expensive than it should be. While studying unable to work full time can have you living pay-check to pay-check as time goes by. However, there are a lot of resources, benefits and perks out there for tertiary students that can be taken advantage of while you are studying. From those available perks, this post will be discussing student bank accounts, and how you can use them to earn the best interest rate available on your savings.
